questions.question: How many vacation days do new employees get?
questions.expected_answer: New employees (0-2 years) receive 15 vacation days per year

questions.question: How many sick days are provided per year?
Can unused vacation days be carried over to the next year?
questions.expected_answer: Maximum 5 days can be carried over to the next calendar year

questions.question: Can I work from home?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, with manager approval, after 90 days of employment

questions.question: What internet speed is required for remote work?
Is there a home office stipend?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, a one-time $500 stipend for home office setup and $50/month internet stipend

questions.question: What is the daily meal limit when traveling?
What is the hotel limit for New York City?
How long do I have to submit expense reports?
questions.expected_answer: Within 30 days of incurring the expense

questions.question: What are the password requirements?
questions.expected_answer: Minimum 12 characters, with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters

questions.question: How often must passwords be changed?
What happens after 5 failed login attempts?
questions.expected_answer: Account locks after 5 failed attempts, auto-unlocks after 30 minutes

questions.question: Do I need to use VPN when working remotely?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, always use VPN to access company resources when working remotely

questions.question: What is the 401k company match?
How long is paid parental leave for birth parents?
What is the tuition reimbursement limit?
Is there a wellness stipend?
questions.expected_answer: $600/year wellness reimbursement for gym, fitness equipment, mental health apps

questions.question: How many paid holidays are there?
Is Juneteenth a company holiday?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, June 19th is a paid company holiday

questions.question: Are there floating holidays?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, 2 floating holidays per year for religious observances or personal celebrations

questions.question: What is the company's harassment policy?
questions.expected_answer: Zero tolerance policy for harassment, all reports investigated, confirmed harassment results in disciplinary action up to termination

questions.question: What is the gift acceptance limit?
questions.expected_answer: Gifts under $100 may be accepted, gifts over $100 must be reported to compliance

questions.question: How long is the probationary period?
How much notice should I give when resigning?
questions.expected_answer: 2 weeks for non-management, 4 weeks for management

questions.question: What is the best pizza place nearby?
Can you help me write a Python script?
What is the weather like today?
Tell me a joke about cats.
Who won the last Super Bowl?
